name: CosmicColonies
0:
”Alexa open Cosmic Colonies”
”Alexa ask Cosmic Colonies to start a new game”
”Alexa, ask Cosmic Colonies to continue my game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cosmic colonies
des:
Cosmic colonies is a decision based game, where every choice you make has consequences on your game. You run a space colony and will encounter many fun scenarios where you must make a difficult decision. See how long you can keep your colony running. 

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Cosmic Colonies
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
